business.headline: SME IPO frenzy: Boss Packing's 135 times subscription despite Sebi's warningBoss Packing Solutions, which supplies packaging machines, labelling, capping, and filling equipment, had an issue size of a little over Rs 8 crore.

Nvidia's market value drops $279 billion. How much did CEO Jensen Huang lose?Despite the loss on Tuesday, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's wealth has still grown by $51 billion so far this year, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.
5 PSU defence stocks to buy as government boosts military spendingAntique Stock Broking has highlighted five defense PSUs with significant growth potential. Read on to discover more.

Ebix becomes debt-free after acquisition by Eraaya LifeSpacesEbix's successful restructuring and debt-free status mark a new chapter for the company, setting the stage for continued growth and investment in its business operations globally.
ECOS Mobility shares list at 17% premium: Should you hold or book profit?ECOS Mobility listing: Shares listed at a premium of 17.15% on the NSE at Rs 391.30, compared to the issue price of Rs 334.

Baazar Style Retail IPO allotment: Step-by-step guide to check statusBaazar Style Retail IPO allotment: Investors who applied for Baazar Style Retail Limited IPO can check their allotment status online via the BSE website or through Link Intime India Private Ltd.

Sebi employees accuse top leadership of creating toxic work environment: Report Sebi employees alleged that "shouting, scolding, and public humiliation have become a norm in meetings," creating a hostile atmosphere that has negatively impacted their mental health and work-life balance.

India's services sector growth jumps to 5-month high in August Despite this, companies in the services sector remained optimistic about future demand, although their confidence dipped to its lowest in over a year.
Sensex, Nifty decline as IT shares plunge; Coal India down over 3%The S&P BSE Sensex was down 404.78 points to 82,150.66 at 10:20 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 136.35 points to trade at 25,143.50.

Risk-takers or safety seekers: Deep dive into Gen Z investment trendsAccording to a report by a Chartered Financial Analyst (CFA), 55% of cryptocurrency investors are Gen Zs. Additionally, 41% of investments in stocks and 25% of investments in NFTs are made by Gen Zs.
Intel at risk of losing spot in blue-chip Dow Jones index as shares plungeThe Dow Jones index, known for its price-weighted methodology, is heavily influenced by stock prices.
Sensex, Nifty end flat as investors remain cautious; financials gainThe S&P BSE Sensex closed 4.40 points lower to end at 82,555.44, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 1.15 points to close at 25,279.85.

Are IPO investors selling their stakes too soon? Sebi study reveals key insightsThe study also provided insights into the geographical distribution of IPO investors. It found that about 70% of IPO investors were from the top four states: Gujarat, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, and Uttar Pradesh.

Can Reliance shares outperform Nifty with upcoming bonus issue?Despite RIL's 8% underperformance relative to the Nifty so far this quarter, and being underweight among mutual funds compared to its NSE200 weight, there are signs of resilience.
Explained: Why Goldman Sachs sees gold as top investment choiceGoldman Sachs has adjusted its gold price target to $2,700, expecting it to reach this level by early 2025 instead of the end of 2024.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Decoding Rahul Gandhi's meet with wrestlers Vinesh Phogat, Bajrang PuniaThe meeting with Rahul Gandhi has intensified speculation that Vinesh Phogat and Bajrang Punia may enter electoral politics in the upcoming Haryana Assembly election.

Akhilesh Yadav's 'bulldozer in Gorakhpur' jab gets Yogi Adityanath's sharp replyAkhilesh Yadav criticised Yogi Adityanath's use of bulldozers in governance and vowed to redirect them to Gorakhpur after the 2027 elections if the Samajwadi Party wins.

Indian-origin grandfather in UK dies after assault, 5 minors arrestedBhim Kohli, an 80-year-old Indian-origin man, died after being attacked by five minors while he was walking his dog in Franklin Park, in eastern England. The children, aged 12 and 14, were arrested on suspicion of murder. Kohli suffered a fatal neck injury and died a day after the attack.

From the archives: How 155 passengers and crew on hijacked IC 814 were freedThe raging controversy over OTT series 'IC-814: The Kandahar Hijack' takes us back to the riveting tale of anguish, anxiety and articulate negotiation leading up to the safe return of the hijacked Indian Airlines plane to Delhi

Beyond the grocery rush: What's fuelling India's instant delivery boom?Quick commerce is changing the retail landscape in India—imagine getting everything from snacks to electronic gadgets at your door in minutes. It's fast, it's fierce, and it's here to stay.

Campaign to boost Indian-American votes by one million ahead of US electionsThe "Indo-American Votes Matter" campaign has been launched by the Foundation for India and Indian Diaspora Studies (FIIDS) to encourage Indian-American voters to participate in the US presidential elections. The campaign aims to register one million Indian-American voters, survey their policy views, and ensure their voices are heard by both parties.

IC 814 hijacker, who killed Rupin Katyal, tried to convert passengers to IslamShakir, the IC 814 hijacker who went by the code name 'Doctor' and was the most brutal of the five terrorists, gave speeches in which he tried to convert the passengers to Islam. Shakir, who slit the throat of newly-wed Rupin Katyal, said "Islam is a better religion, much better than Hinduism".

Court refuses to order certification of 'Emergency', Kangana Ranaut reactsThe film was slated to hit the screens on September 6 but has been postponed after Sikh organisations raised concerns over the accuracy of historical facts.

New eye drops could replace reading glasses and treat this diseaseIndia's drug regulatory agency has approved new eye drops to help people with presbyopia remove the need for reading glasses. This condition affects over a billion people in the world.

Sathyabama welcomes the Yorker Champion Jasprit BumrahIn a memorable event, Sathyabama University had the honour of hosting one of India's most celebrated cricket icons, Mr. Jasprit Bumrah. The university's President, Dr. Marie Johnson, and Chancellor, Dr. Mariazeena Johnson, warmly welcomed the champion fast bowler, renowned for his impeccable yorkers, to the campus.

The atmosphere was electric as students gathered in large numbers, eager to catch a glimpse of the cricket sensation. Their excitement and enthusiasm were palpable, reflecting the immense respect and admiration they hold for Bumrah. His visit not only inspired the students but also created an unforgettable experience, further strengthening the bond between sports and academia at Sathyabama University.

Bloodstains on Darshan's clothes, Pavithra Gowda's slippers: Police chargesheetIn the chargesheet submitted in court in Renukaswamy murder case, the police have cited over 200 pieces of circumstantial evidences, including forensic reports of bloodstains on the clothes of Darshan and on the slippers of Pavithra Gowda.

IC 814 survivors say Netflix series shows truth but not all of what went down Rakesh and Pooja Kataria, who spoke to India Today TV, were a young couple at the time of the incident. They were returning home from their honeymoon in Nepal. The couple asserted that the codenames used for the hijackers in the Netflix series is true.

IndiGo passenger asks Tamil pilot to make in-flight announcement in Hindi. Viral videoAn IndiGo passenger asked a Tamil pilot to make an in-flight announcement in Hindi. The video of his earnest attempt has charmed the internet.

Boy sexually assaulted in Delhi's Govindpuri, paramilitary deployed amid protestsThe matter came to light on September 1 after the boy revealed to his parents that he was sexually abused by his neighbour.

Video: PM Modi tries his hand at dhol after arrival in SingaporePrime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday kicked-off his two-day visit to Singapore. He received warm welcome from the Indian diaspora in the south-east Asian country. Moments lates the Prime Minister was seen playing dhol (Indian drum) along with the Indian artistes who showcases cultural performances to welcome the Indian leader to the country.

World champion Sachin Khilari wins silver with Asian Record in ParisParalympics 2024: India's Sachin Khilari clinched the silver medal in men's shot put F46 event on Wednesday, September 4. The world champion's 16.32m throw was the best that an Asian has ever thrown in the F46 category.
Video: Passengers scream as 300-foot yacht crashes with boat in Turkey The superyacht "Ice" was seen crashing into the stern of a 100-foot yacht.

Delhi Congress leaders asked not to speak on alliance with AAP in Haryana: SourcesThe Congress and AAP have reached an "in-principle understanding" over their alliance in Haryana for the upcoming Assembly polls, sources told India Today TV.

The spy on IC 814 who was a ghost passenger in Kandahar hijack Shashi Bhushan Singh Tomar's name wasn't among the names released to the public by the team managing the IC 814 Kandahar hijack. The reason was that he was the RAW station head in Kathmandu. Had the hijackers come to know that Shashi Bhushan was on IC 814, he wouldn't have been let off alive.

Woman molested at five-star hotel in Kolkata, 2 arrestedThe incident took place on Tuesday night during a party at the popular five-star hotel in Kolkata. The arrests were made based on a complaint lodged by the survivor.
Why record Indian tourists want to go to Kazakhstan, AzerbaijanA recent study reveals that Kazakhstan, Azerbaijan, and Bhutan top the list of emerging countries Indians are eyeing for travel.

Puja Khedkar's disability certificate likely forged: Delhi Police to courtThe 34-year-old Khedkar, who was appointed as a trainee IAS officer in the Maharashtra cadre, allegedly attempted to take the examination beyond the permissible limit by faking her identity, including changing her name, her parents' names, her photograph, signature, email ID, mobile number, and address.

4 Indians, carpooling in Texas, charred to death as truck rams SUV from behindA multi-vehicle collision in Anna, Texas, killed four Indian nationals, including two people from Hyderabad. The four had carpooled and were travelling to Bentonville when a speeding truck rear-ended their SUV, causing it to burst into flames. The impact trapped the four occupants inside the car, and they were charred to death.

Himachal MLA's sexist 'without make-up' remark against Kangana Ranaut stirs rowThe Congress MLA's remarks came days after Kangana Ranaut posted images on social media from her visit to a flood-hit area in the hill state, which has witnessed extensive damage as a result of heavy rain and subsequent flooding.

'GOAT' update: Makers of Thalapathy Vijay's film share new promo ahead of releaseAhead of its grand release on September 5, the makers of Thalapathy Vijay's 'Greatest of All Time' (GOAT) shared a new update on the film. They released a musical promo on social media.

Ram Charan to Prabhas: Telugu stars donate to Telangana, Andhra relief fundTop Telugu actors Ram Charan, Allu Arjun, and Prabhas have donated a total of Rs 4 crore to the CM Relief Fund to aid flood-affected regions in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana.

Stree 2 box office day 20: Rajkummar Rao's film earns Rs 515 croreRajkummar Rao and Shraddha Kapoor's Stree 2 continues to break box office records, earning Rs 515 crore in just 20 days. The film's blend of horror, comedy, and social commentary has resonated with audiences and critics alike.

'Madam Sapna': Sapna Choudhary to unfold her life in new filmDancer Sapna Choudhary's life journey from Haryana to Cannes will be depicted in the film 'Madam Sapna', presented by filmmaker Mahesh Bhatt. The announcement was made on September 4.

sports.headline: IPL sensation Jake Fraser-McGurk makes T20I debut vs ScotlandAustralia's young talent Jake Fraser-McGurk debuts in T20I against Scotland, bringing fresh energy to the team after an impressive IPL season. Paired with Travis Head, Fraser-McGurk aims to boost Australia's top order in the ongoing series.

Young could win a US Open title with friend Townsend in his final matchDonald Young and Taylor Townsend, long-time friends and tennis partners, have reached the mixed doubles final at the US Open. This match is especially significant as it marks the final game of Young's professional tennis career.

Shubman Gill's honest take on Test performances: Not been up to my expectationsShubman Gill has admitted that his performances in Tests haven't been up to his expectations ahead of the start of the Duleep trophy 2024. Gill made his debut in Tests and is currently playing the No.3 role for India.

ENG vs SL: England hand 6ft 7in pacer Josh Hull debut in 3rd Test at OvalEngland have handed Josh Hull his Test debut as they announced the playing XI for the 3rd match of the series against Sri Lanka at the Oval, starting from September 6, Friday.

Rahul Dravid set to be appointed Rajasthan Royals head coach for IPL 2025Rahul Dravid is set to become the head coach of Rajasthan Royals for IPL 2025. The former Indian cricketer will be reuniting with Sanju Samson, who is expected to continue as captain.

Archer Sheetal Devi celebrates Paralympics medal with motherIndia's para-archer Sheetal Devi thanked her mother for unwavering support, after securing a bronze medal at the Paris Paralympics. Her victory in the mixed team compound event highlights her rise as a future star in para-archery.

Pakistan slip to 59-year low after 2-0 series loss to Bangladesh at homeICC Test Rankings: Pakistan slipped two spots to No. 8 in the latest rankings, updated on Wednesday, September 04. The decline came after Pakistan were whitewashed 2-0 at home by Bangladesh on Tuesday.

Paralympics: Indian badminton contingent gets tremendous welcome in DelhiThe Indian badminton contingent arrived the New Delhi after a tremendous run in the Paris Paralympics on Wednesday, September 4. The contingent was greeted at the IGI Airport amidst much fanfare by the fans and family members of the athletes.

Indian challenge ends as Rohan Bopanna knocked out in mixed doubles semisUS Open 2024: Rohan Bopanna and his Indonesian partner Aldila Sutjiadi were knocked out in the mixed doubles semi-final. The Indo-Indonesia pair lost to American pair of Donald Young and Taylor Townsend 3-6, 4-6

Day 7 Live Updates: Harvinder progresses, Sachin Khilari wins silverParalympics 2024, Day 7 Live Updates: Harvinder Singh has progressed to the next round with a sensational 7-3 win in the Men's Individual Recurve Open 1/16 Elimination Match with a win over TSENG Lung-Hui.

Watch: PM Modi speaks to armless archer Sheetal Devi after Paralympics medalParalympics: Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Sheetal Devi via a phone call and congratulated her for her success at the Paralympic Games in Paris. Sheetal won the mixed team compound archery bronze with Rakesh Kumar in Paris. The armless archer said she was happy to have her mother in Paris during her maiden Games appearance.

Yuvraj shared a hilarious training video in which Abhishek keeps ignoring his advice and keeps hitting big sixes.

Injury haunts valiant Dimitrov, Tiafoe vs Fritz in all-American semisUS Open 2024: Frances Tiafoe returned to the semi-final in New York for the first time since 2022 after his opponent, Grigor Dimitrov, retired with an injury in the quarter-final on Tuesday. Tiafoe will face compatriot Taylor Fritz in the first all-American semi-final at a Grand Slam since 2005.

Shan Masood clears air around Afridi 'shoulder shrug': He was not angryShan Masood cleared the air on rumored tension with Shaheen Afridi, explaining viral incidents during Pakistan's Test series loss to Bangladesh, while emphasizing the need for more Test matches to improve the team's performance.

Emma Navarro wins hearts with special thanks to father for US Open winEmma Navarro's heartfelt thanks to her father highlighted her journey to her first Grand Slam semi-final, following a stunning comeback victory over Paula Badosa at the US Open, where she showcased resilience and remarkable athleticism.

Watch: Roger Federer's roaring return to US Open sends fans into frenzyRoger Federer returned to the US Open, receiving a hero's welcome at Arthur Ashe Stadium as he watched Aryna Sabalenka dominate Qinwen Zheng, securing her record-equalling fourth consecutive semi-final appearance.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

WC influential ten: Writers community honors digital social change makersWriters Community Freelancers Releases 'WC Influential Ten' List Recognizing Social Impact through Virtual Space and Social Media
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
